Paragraph.Text: The Stamper Tlant is a regular Conveyor fitted with a machine for stamping metal Bars into Plates, and behaves like a Conveyor in all circumstances. It runs at the same speed as a Basic Conveyor, except on Rapid mode, where it runs at 3x the speed of a Basic Conveyor. Fast Conveyors does not affect this.
Feed metal bars into the Stamper from another Conveyor, Conveyor-based machine, or Conveyor Turntable. The Stamper will convert the Bars into Plates which can be used in additional recipes.
The Stamper is essential for the automation of Laboratory Research.
